members.name: showMessengerKeyboard
members.description: Programmatically pop up the keyboard again if the user dismissed it.

members.name: hideMessengerKeyboard
members.description: Programmatically hide the keyboard (but not the messenger bar)

members.name: updateMessenger
members.description: Manipulate the messenger while it's open. For instance if you want to update the text programmatically based on what the user typed.
